name: Maple Glazed Carrots
author: cherbear
summary: A super-easy side dish for any occasion. Nice sweet and salty flavor to the carrots!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place carrots into a pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes
Drain and transfer carrots to a serving bowl
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat
Stir maple syrup into melted butter and cook until warmed, 1 to 2 more minutes
Pour butter-maple syrup over carrots and toss to coat; season with salt and pepper
